arunreddy - (02/07/2009 13:24): sdumitriu : Hi  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 13:25): Hi arunreddy  
arunreddy - (02/07/2009 13:25): I have some problem Commiting the xml files.  
arunreddy - (02/07/2009 13:25): "unable to commit because file has inconsistent newlines"  
arunreddy - (02/07/2009 13:26): am commiting directly from eclipse.  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 13:27): dos2unix  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 13:28): Or, from eclipse  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 13:28): File -> Convert line delimiters to  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 13:28  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 13:28): Unix  
arunreddy - (02/07/2009 13:29): ok  
arunreddy - (02/07/2009 13:31): Working Thanks a lot. :)

glerouge\_\_ - (02/07/2009 17:11): Hi sdumitriu  
glerouge\_\_ - (02/07/2009 17:11): sdumitriu: any update about how the LaTeX plugin integration is going ?  
alexmaru left at 17:11 ()  
glerouge\_\_ - (02/07/2009 17:12): sdumitriu: I had a question about using the #footnote macro in syntax 2.0 too  
glerouge\_\_ - (02/07/2009 17:12): do you have a couple minutes to talk about them ?  
tmortagne left at 17:27 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
tmortagne\_ joined #xwiki at 17:27  
mflorea left at 17:46 ("Leaving")  
glerouge\_\_ left at 18:02 ()  
jvelociter - (02/07/2009 18:02): lol  
glerouge joined #xwiki at 18:02  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 18:16  
marta\_ joined #xwiki at 18:31  
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:31): hi glerouge  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:31): hi  
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:32): what about the #footnote macro?  
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:32): (you said you had a question)  
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:33): ... about an hour ago...  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:33): yep  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:33): when using it in syntax 2.0 there are 2 issues:  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:34): \* since it's not a rendering macro one needs to use {{velocity}}{{html}}#footnote(""){{/html}}{{/velocity}} which isn't very convenient  
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:34): yes, well, this macro will be deprecated soon  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:34): \* when used, it inserts a white line between the part of the sentence that comes before and the one that comes after  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:35): deprecated, not updated ?  
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:35): there's a {{footnote}} rendering macro on sergiu's computer  
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:35): waiting to pass ckeckstyle and be committed  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:35): ok, great  
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:35): :)  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:35): do you have an ETA?   
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:35): do we ever?  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:35): we'll probably use it on one of our customer projects if / when it becomes available  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:35): lol  
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:36): i hope it will make it in m2  
tachirei left #xwiki at 18:36  
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:37): and there's also an issue with included documents in a new context that needs to be solved  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 18:38): But that requires some changes in the rendering process  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 18:38): So it will have to be postponed as a known issue  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:40): the issue with included documents is related to the footnote one ?  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 18:40): Yes  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:41): ok  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 18:41): The problem is that footnotes have the same ID  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 18:41): so if I have footnotes in document A, and footnotes in document B  
marta\_ - (02/07/2009 18:41): uhm, yes, there's an issue with the footnote macro when called in both the including doc and the included doc  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 18:41): And A includes B in a new context  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:41): they're gonna collide  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 18:41): Then the footnotes will have duplicate IDs  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 18:41): And they won't point to the right location  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 18:41): Yes  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:41): ok  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:42): what about the LaTeX plugin integration btw, is it going fine? ;)  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 18:42): But I think this scenario is rather unlikely  
sdumitriu - (02/07/2009 18:42): I haven't looked at it lately  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:42): yep, I think it's better to have that macro with the issue that not have the macro  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:42): ok  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:42): do you know when you'll be able to look at it ?  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:42): we're gonna need for a customer in the coming weeks  
glerouge - (02/07/2009 18:43): and it's been asked for by a number of community members too  
lucaa left #xwiki at 18:49
